This function may be called multiple times, even for the same entity, because we let users load plugins at runtime. So maybe it's not the best place to put the logic to check if log plugins should be loaded.

My suggestion would be to add it at the `Server` constructor so it applies to all the simulation runners. You could do something like [this](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/242/acropolis-use-state-instead-of-pose-in/diff#Ltest/integration/network_handshake.ccT123) to append a `PluginConfig` to `ServerConfig`.
